did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Minutes of the Virginia Real Estate Board,

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: The Real Estate Board was established in 1924 to regulate businesses and individuals representing others in real property transactions, including condominiums, cooperatives, and time-shares. The Board issues licenses to persons, partnerships, associations or corporations to act as real estate brokers or real estate salesmen or to advertise or assume to act as such real estate brokers or real estate salesmen and to promulgate regulations for education requirements for licensure and relicensure. An adjunct responsibility allows the Board to investigate housing discrimination under the aegis of the Federal Fair Housing Act. The Dept. of Professional and Occupational Regulation provides administrative support to the board.

odd.p: These records are part of the Virginia Dept. of Professional and Occupational Regulation record group (RG 17)

accessrestrict.p: Meeting attachments must be reviewed for personal information and redacted prior to being served.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Virginia Real Estate Board, Minutes, [cite specific date and accession used]. State government records collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

controlaccess.corpname: Virginia. -- Dept. of Professional and Occupational Regulation.
Virginia. -- Dept. of Professional and Occupational Regulation.

scopecontent.p: Includes official minutes, agendas and related attachments documenting the activities of the Virginia Real Estate Board. May also include section minutes, minutes of informal fact finding conferences and conflict of interest letters.
